settings.content:
Available Monday through Friday, 9am to 7pm EST,
and Saturday 10am to 3pm EST.

settings.title: How should I know which chair suits me?
settings.content:
First of all, please clarify your use scene, height and weight, and preferred surface material.

For use scene: Take the armrest as an example, the linkage armrest model will be more suitable for leisure and game scenes, and the 4D armrest will be more suitable for work and office use scenes.

For height and weight: Our convenient size calculator can recommend the most suitable product for you based on your height and weight. The most important indicator is height (approximately 26% of height), please confirm this before purchasing.

For favorite fabric: A chair with fabric will be more breathable, and of course it will be more difficult to clean. A chair with retro leather will be more glamorous and comfortable to the touch, but sitting for a long time may feel stuffy.

Hope you can find a comfortable chair that suits you. - Dowinx Ergonomics Research Center Jack

settings.title: When will the Dowinx prototype gaming table be available for purchase?
settings.content:
We expect pre-sales to begin in the 2nd of 2022, and deliveries will begin in the 3rd. Thank you for your continued attention.

-------------Dowinx table project team

settings.title: How will my order be delivered?
settings.content: We deliver your order straight to your address via FedEx. Once your order ships, you'll receive a shipping confirmation email and tracking number, so you can follow your package as it makes its way to you.
